title: Summer Friday #4: Nick Kroll | Ross Luippold's Love Lounge | Summer Book Club
description:
Seth Meyers interviews Nick Kroll.

Then at 39:52, hear an original comedy sketch just for the podcast when Ross Luippold of the Late Night digital team offers love advice.

After that, at 47:28, book recommendations from Stacey Abrams, Jason Reynolds and Tayari Jones.
